name: Nazar, Inc.
description: Developer of a cloud-based application designed to help in database performance monitoring. The company's cloud-based application specializes in agentless database performance monitoring to keep applications running fast and reduce infrastructure costs, enabling businesses to perform database analysis and quality monitoring for all tasks.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud-based application designed to help in database performance monitoring. The company's cloud-based application specializes in agentless database performance monitoring to keep applications running fast and reduce infrastructure costs, enabling businesses to perform database analysis and quality monitoring for all tasks.
